content: hook creative off the hook creative offthehookcreative@gmail com a special mention i would like to thank my fabulous testers they all made gorgeous sassy scrappy beanies go take a look at their instagram pages don t forget to show them some love 🩷󰗔 copyright this pattern is created & written by carmen white from off the hook creative this written pattern including pictures & charts are solely owned by carmen white you may not adjust modify resell or share this pattern in any way feel free to sell or market the finished items you have made from this pattern but please credit the pattern design to off the hook creative 12
